org.apache.hadoop.hbase.chaos.monkies

类 PolicyBasedChaosMonkey

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.chaos.monkies.ChaosMonkey
      • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.chaos.monkies.PolicyBasedChaosMonkey
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.Stoppable

    public class PolicyBasedChaosMonkey
extends ChaosMonkey
    Chaos monkey that given multiple policies will run actions against the cluster.

      • isDestructive

        public boolean isDestructive()
        从类复制的说明: ChaosMonkey
        Returns whether the CM does destructive actions (killing servers) so that a cluster restore is needed after CM is stopped. Otherwise cluster will be left as it is
        指定者:
        isDestructive 在类中 ChaosMonkey
